website_summaries.verdict: Kids love this interactive drawing app and erasable board, which features engaging characters that encourage creativity.
pros: Easy-to-use app is a hit with kids, and the included dry erase board and markers offer extra savings to parents rather than using up paper
Monster game is available in Spanish
Works with iPad or there's a Fire tablet version
cons: Dry erase board is prone to scratching, which can make it harder for Osmo to scan the drawings correctly

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids that likes to draw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for kids who like to draw. It is very interactive. You do not need to buy the kit if you have the base and just download the Osmo monster app. You can use paper or your own dry and erase board for the game. Very entertaining for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: kyuriz

customer_reviews.title: VERY INTERACTIVE
customer_reviews.text: My son (4years old) isn't very fond of drawing but this changed everything. OSMO is very interactive and my son laughs and enjoys everything about this as he sees his creation up on the screen. There is a story that helps understand what he's drawing. It's fun for both parents and kids Side note: Osmo creative is not just drawing but there are also different games he can choose to play. I limited screen time so he can be creative creating his creations. :P
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old son really liked this game when we first got it but he started to lose interest pretty quickly. After a while, you end up just replaying the same thing over and over and I can see why he got bored with it. I love the concept but wish there were more activities in the game itself. I don't​ think its worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of the season!!  We love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite Christmas gift that my 9 year old daughter got. She plays with it over and over. It’s one of those I hate to tell her to get off her Ipad from. She was designing a kitchen and a bathroom last I looked. So many things to do, and there are 3 apps you can download to go with this one. We just downloaded Newton and Masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelsluckygirl13

customer_reviews.title: Really cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my four-year-old for Christmas but my nine-year-old loves it too, frankly I think it's sort of fun myself. Well made good product only thing is you have to take the iPad out of its case to use it which is in anyone's fault but you have to be careful that your children don't break the iPad when they're done playing with it with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mattera

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos (6 and 8) love this game
customer_reviews.text: Kiddos (6 and 8) love this game! They play all the time. Easy for them to set up and break down on their own. It makes me feel better about them being on technology when i feel like they are actually learning something rather than wasting their time on non learning games.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: When we received this item two of the markers did not work (dried out) and the software is not recognizing my kiddo's drawings. Its pretty upsetting. I cannot return the item and it appears I cannot buy new markers from this company. We tried other dry erase markers and those do not work either.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRox

customer_reviews.title: Only negative is that the markers don't last long but other dry erase markers work fine. I read another reviewer say they could not ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter loves this! Only negative is that the markers don't last long but other dry erase markers work fine. I read another reviewer say they could not completely remover marker off board but we have not problem.
customer_reviews.author: jamintrae

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Game
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter and 7 year old son fight over who gets to play this game first. It keeps them engaged by taking them on story adventures that they must illustrate along the way. I like that it gives them an example on the side to get them started or they can be creative with their own design. I am concerned that they might get bored after they have drawn for every story. It would be great if there were extra stories you could add on. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pdxmom

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the creative kid
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl loves to draw. She has taken an interest in technology recently and we are trying to avoid her endlessly watching trash on you tube. This was the answer. It’s an interactive Drawing game. They draw characters or artifacts on a whiteboard then they magically appear alongside the animated characters. The characters then interact with the kids drawings and bring them to life. My little girl loves it when she draws a rocket ship and the monster rides it. Honestly, you can hear her laughing from 2 rooms away. She is five and this is a perfect gift. We will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: A Farser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for my child.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 6 year old daughter and she loves it. The base allows her to interact with the games while developing her fine motor skills by drawing. The iPad sits in the base and you place the red cover which has a mirror inside over the front facing camera. A white board is then used to interact with the games. It’s actually quite clever and she has a lot of fun with it. The app allows a parental account with reports and some control. There are also other expansion packs you can buy for other games. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: I use it at home and in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: My school bought one a couple years ago and our students enjoyed (and still do) playing it so I bought one for my daughter (she was turning 3). It was a hit at home like it was at school. Since then, we have purchased more accessories for our Osmo. We even purchased a case for it so when we travel to California every Christmas...it does with us. Heck, even the adults love to play and draw on it. Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously fantastic game!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive and well-executed game!! The concept of merging a child's creativity with today's obsession of the iPad is GENIUS. The software has worked perfectly so far, no lagging or crashing. Graphics are up to today's quality standards. The character in the game is not some "Disney knockoff" (which my nephew would recognize as a knockoff and immediately hate), but actually comprable! Best of all watching my nephew's excitement while playing this makes it worth every penny. I truly appreciate the attention to detail from the creators and developers. Thank you osmo crew!!!
customer_reviews.author: CStrill.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE Osmo! I wanted to get a second base and reflector for our second iPad and decided to get this whole kit. My 5, 7, and 10 year olds love it, and their friends ask to play with it when they come over. They love seeing what they draw on the pad show up on the iPad! It pushes them to think creatively to come up with new fun things for the activities. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: C&A Allen

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly really cool for kids! He loves his drawings coming to life. He’s loving the Newton game the most though! He loves trying to figure out what he can put on there to fire up the fans and hit the targets. Really cool games! I just went online and purchased a couple more games to go with it! looking forward to getting them in!
customer_reviews.author: kr611

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I almost got it straight from Target but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I almost got it straight from Target but Amazon was close to 10 dollars cheaper. The kids were amazed and we're sharing and laughing. I can't wait to get the reading and math for it for my oldest !!! The ONLY thing I would say that was negative is if you leave a picture on the board to long it stains the board. I was surprised. But hey that's the ONLY thing I have to say bad about this item
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: We got this on prime deals so the price was unreal, I should have bought one more and saved it for my nephew for Christmas. This is the best toy I think My kids have owned. They play for hours and yes it has electronics but still requires for them to use their brain and imagination and expand on their skills. Must buy this toy. It has no downfalls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Osmo set!
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made! Innovative idea and both of my kids enjoyed drawing with it (ages 5 and 7). I’m competing against Roblox, Tik Tok, and You Tube Kids, so even just 15 minutes with this was a huge win for me. I would like to add more of the games, but they are terribly expensive. I would say this was worth retail price if your kids are into drawing and art, if they can sit and color for hours. Otherwise you would have to think of this as a starting set and add other games to keep their interest as they age.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Creativity Always Wins
customer_reviews.text: This has kept our whole family entertained since we got it. Only a day in, and my kids are starting to show some real concentration when attempting to recreate drawings in the Monster game. The absolute best part is that the apps and hardware work on an iPad2. That's right the device I've had in a drawer for a year because every app I loaded crashed each time, works just as well with these apps as does my new 2018 iPad. I couldn't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ghuneim

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing
customer_reviews.text: My son got this as a Christmas gift. He loves drawing on it and watching his drawings come to life. Two of the markers didn’t work right out of the kit which was disappointing. I emailed the company and they are sending replacement markers! This is our first Osmo kit and so my son has been a bit disappointed that there are only a few activities. I would like to get him more but it seems I have to buy a whole genius kit to get the needed pieces including a base which we already have.
customer_reviews.author: LL Ham

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old sets this up by herself and plays it every chance she can! She has always loved to draw and I love that this pushes her to draw different objects and new things that she hasn't tried to draw before. The whole family loves to get involved and play also. We have the other kits, but this one is fun for everyone. Downfall: she broke her board and we tried to buy a new one because we liked how it set up with the base so it doesn't slide around, but they don't sell them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 y/o daughter. She absolutely loved playing with it when she first received it. We have had it for about 6 months now and she doesn't play with it as often as I would have guessed. The concept is cute. We have slowly been purchasing other games and she seems to be enjoying those more than the Monster game.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for educational and fun screen time!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her Osmo stuff and I don’t mind her having screen time if she’s doing any of these apps. I thought there was more “tech” involved here but it’s just a mirror that works with your camera, which means compatibility isn’t an issue. You’re really paying for the use of the apps, which are high quality and free in the App Store but you need these extras to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about the entire Osmo brand. My kids love the creative kit. So much fun watching what they draw come to life on the iPad. I have a 3, 4 & 6 year old for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Angelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Osmo Creative Kit is a great tool to help kids express their creativity. My son was hooked within minutes, and it was quite fun to see how he approached drawing people and various things. The moment the first drawing appeared on the screen was magical - and it still felt magical every time the character in the app 'pulled' my son's drawing and interacted with it. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a fun educational app or activity for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cute at the beggining but ends up being repetitive
customer_reviews.text: Repetative, loved at the beggining, my daughter was thrilled, until you are asked to draw the same room, over and over and over again. Not fun anymore, after two weeks daily use. A little expensive for that.
customer_reviews.author: PATUTI

customer_reviews.title: Buy them all!
customer_reviews.text: Woah! They definitely didn’t have anything like this when I was a kid. My son and I spent hours playing together the day we opened it. So interactive and fun! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena Castiglione

customer_reviews.title: horrible doesn't do what video describes.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our kids for christmas and what a disappointment! It does not do what the advertising video shows. we had 4 different adults try and figure it out to work but it was the same for all of us. Great idea, horrible execution.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Melissa Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Great for young children
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this when he was 5, and I bought one for school and the students in all of the primary classes enjoy it too. The app is wonderful and children can see to art come to life on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: R and K

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: We love the monster game for our 4.5 year old. The other games are for a little older ages and she hasn’t grasped them yet but she loves the monster game. It’s very interactive and keeps her attention. She loves that her drawings come to life!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: its awesome but...
customer_reviews.text: in the monster app there are not enough things to do
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I went against some of the reviews for the Osmo and purchased it for my five year old and I’m glade I did! He hasn’t wanted to turn it off. He’s on his I pad but his imagination is going, his drawing and solving puzzles. He loves it and I love It too, especially because of how interactive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Soribel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! My four year old really enjoys playing on it. The apps are easy to install and you can start using this in only a few minutes. What a great tool to use with your child and technology!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome way to learn!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old niece loves the Osmo kit! She loves to draw & the interaction with the cute monster holds her attention longer than most art projects. It’s creative, fun, entertaining & educational!
customer_reviews.author: MissyMe

customer_reviews.title: A fun activity for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! I bought this for my son, who does like to draw. I really wanted to find something that gave him some inspiration to take an interest in art. The first day we had this, he spent about 45 minutes drawing and playing the games. It's such a cute concept!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Louis

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for 2 sets of grandchildren, ages 3, 4, 5, and 10. They love it! The 5-year-old opened it and got excited because she's used one at school, so she was all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan I Williams SD

customer_reviews.title: Coolest kids toy I've seen in a while!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter's 6th birthday and she has been obsessed with it ever since! Definitely seems like something she will enjoy using for years to come! We're planning to give her more Osmo games/apps for Christmas. My 3 year old son is not quite ready to play with it on his own, but he loves to do it with his sister. Amazing technology!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C

customer_reviews.title: Genius! Toddler approved.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest idea!! My son is obsessed with osmo. He’s 3 and has a blast seeing his creations come to life and interact with the orange monster character. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my pre-k classroom, church kids ministry, and in my home with my 5 and 7 year old. They love it!! Works really well to jump start representational drawinga for younger friends and still engages the older crowds
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He loves to draw and see it on screen. Easy to set up and use. Only thing I dislike is having to take the case off the iPad to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Educational toy.
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this product. It actually keeps her off the TV as she always have something else to do.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Very educational and entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product with numerous options for expansions. Very creative and educational. Kids can use their imaginations, and practice drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbiesforfun

customer_reviews.title: It is great and my daughter played it for a long time
customer_reviews.text: It is great and my daughter played it for a long time ... for 3 days then lost interest in it and it's just each child's preference I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Warren

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to open it Christmas day to find it messed up!! The drawing board is damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the Osmo Creative Kit
customer_reviews.text: We love the Osmo Creative Kit. The kids are amazed at how their artwork comes to life. I also like the Newton game. I think its a great learning game and tons of fun at the same time. My kids enjoy to challenge themselves and get to the next level. They are already asking for the Osmo Pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Hristina

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this. She giggles and plays in long intervals without getting bored. Very creative and inventive toy!
customer_reviews.author: Lori ~Lover of Books~

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (4-6) love this drawing game with Mo! Sometimes they draw the shapes like they are supposed to and sometimes they get creative and draw something silly, but either way they have lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Darkon

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and can’t wait for the kids to try it out on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: RLZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE Monster. Super fun. The markers are smeary on the board making it hard to clean, but otherwise outstanding all around.
customer_reviews.author: pugapoo_owner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do a lot of research before buying this so I had no clue what to expect. But it provides hours of educational fun for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyW

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool product! My 6 year old loves it. Highly recommend to any one with little ones that want a toy to entertain and educate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara N Burks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old daughter loves this. It’s easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Cool, interactive drawing activity for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved watching Osmo use his drawings in cartoon animations. It was his favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Yup yup yup love this! My 7 year old daughter loves this too . I can’t wait to buy more games
customer_reviews.author: Bozmomma

customer_reviews.title: My grand child is only 3 ...I may have purchased this too soon.
customer_reviews.text: It's very fun but does require adult help to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wert

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4+
customer_reviews.text: Daughters really liked the product. My 4 year old thought it was really neat when she drew a picture and it popped up on the iPad. Only con so far is you have to take the iPad out of the protective case to put it in the docking station
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L Ryterski

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great purchase. We will be adding more Osmo games to our kit. We have a household that ranges from 11 to 2 so toys that entertain multiple ages are great!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna L.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this game .. I will add on soon .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Stimulates creativity.
customer_reviews.text: This will stimulate a young mind and add creativity to their iPad time. What a great addition to any household with children.
customer_reviews.author: Marj Helm

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining for a large age range.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so our grandsons (ages 3 - 10) would have something fun to do while visiting. Each one of them loved it. The bonus was that the boy whose turn it was enjoyed using it and all the other boys sat close and enjoyed watching as much as playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome interaction
customer_reviews.text: So fun. Our 9 year old loves the creativity it offers and even lets her 3 year old sister join in on the fun! Love the interactions this game offers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelleyfamily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining for children and easy to use.would recommend to anybody with children.
customer_reviews.author: Lauro M.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it for her birthday.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the right computer pad to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Osmo is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 y/o LOVES all the Osmo Products thus far. Great way to teach them patience and problem solving, art, math & spelling! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids that like to draw and have an imagination
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my little cousin and she loves it. It's really interactive and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Phantom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a Xmas present for my daughter and she loves it and plays with it all the time now.

customer_reviews.title: Very creative!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love osmo! It’s very creative and fun. Keeps both my 5 and 8 year old busy for awhile.

customer_reviews.title: Good over all
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just wish they fit with the case on so I don't have to worry about the tablet getting broken

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 4 year old for Christmas, our 7 year old enjoys it just as much as she does, very interactive and fun!

customer_reviews.text: the kids only play it for a few days. don't waste your money. also it not cheap .

customer_reviews.title: Interactive
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, my 7 year old loves it, easy to use and keeps her entertained for a long time! it’s very interactive and a great learning tool!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Truly loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter's 8th birthday and she was ecstatic over it. Truly loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome creative fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loves this! Stand is adjustable so it works on all 3 of our iPads.

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: My students love this. They are always wanting to use it.

customer_reviews.title: its just a piece of plastic with a free app
customer_reviews.text: not impressed and neither was my son. I exchanged this for a drawing tablet.

customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, they are getting so much fun and learning new things

customer_reviews.text: My daughter has cerebral palsy and this game is interactive and is fun for her to play she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter got it for Christmas. She loves to play this game and can play it independently. She laughs as she plays it.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup download and use. Students enjoy it. Has several learning environments. Box is useful for storage in between uses.

customer_reviews.title: fun product

customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it! After he did all of them, he has gotten bored with it but it’s super creative and interactive!

customer_reviews.title: Neat snd very awesome for kids to learn
customer_reviews.text: Nowadays kids are not taught to write and with all the electronics, at least they still draw and my son even learned how to write in cursive

customer_reviews.title: She is 6 and wasn't really sure how good it would be
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She is 6 and wasn't really sure how good it would be, but it is super fun and she loves it!

customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest toy ever!!! Probably my daughters favorite front christmas... and mine, too! It’s so fun! Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Finally an educational game that you won’t feel bad abt kids getting screen time! Works great and my kids ages 12-2 loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Great product and easy for my kids to manage on their own once I got them going the first time. They will sit and draw quietly and easy to take on the go!

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!

product_meta.title: Osmo - Creative Kit for iPad (Newer Version Available - Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Osmo learning games makes it fun for children to learn, using Toys as Teaching Tools. Osmo is Magic! In 2013, Osmo created a fun-filled & award winning learning games that interact with actual hand held pieces & an iPad and/or Fire Tablet, bringing a child's game pieces & actions to life (No WiFi necessary for game play). Osmo merges tactile exploration with innovative technology, actively engaging children in the learning process. Osmo games develop a wide range of skills, varying skills based on each game, including: Creativity, Problem-Solving, Confidence Gaining, Child-Led, Hands-On, Gender-Neutral, Curriculum Inclusion, Social/Emotional Skills, STEM/STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering Math & Art) and many more educational capabilities. Games are designed for children between the ages of 3-11+ and include beginner to expert levels. OSMO enables the continuation of learning. Parents can track game progress, using child game profiles, on a parent app.

Creative Kit for iPad focuses on the following game play: Travel on an adventure & solve story problems with personal drawings brought to life instantly on the iPad (Monster) along with drawing problem solving/early physics (Newton), creative drawing skills (Masterpiece).

Approved by parents and teachers worldwide, used in over 30,000 classrooms.

Tag your photos on social media with #Osmomagic to be featured!
feature_bullets: OSMO IS MAGIC: Fun-filled & award winning learning games that interact with actual hand held pieces & an iPad and/or Fire Tablet, bringing a child's game pieces & actions to life (No WiFi necessary for game play).

TEACHING: Travel on an adventure & solve story problems with personal drawings brought to life instantly on the iPad (Monster) along with drawing problem solving/early physics (Newton), creative drawing skills (Masterpiece).
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Osmo Base for iPad, Creative Board, 4 erasable markers, Fuzzy eraser pouch, Stackable storage for each game, & 3 Game Apps: Monster, Newton, and Masterpiece.

OSMO PROMISE: Designed with fun & learning in mind, in Palo Alto, California. 90 day Warranty. An iPad & OSMO Base (iPad is not included) are required to play. Compatible with iPad 2-6, iPad Mini 1-4, iPad Air 1-2, iPad Pro 9.7 & 10.5 inch. Fire Tablet is not compatible with this base.
AGE & CAPABILITY: Ages 5-10+. Games are designed for beginner to expert levels. OSMO enables the continuation of learning. Track game progress, using child game profiles, on a parent app.
